cave-entrance.name: Cave Entrance
cave-entrance.description: You stand at the entrance of a dark cave. Faint light filters in from outside.
cave-entrance.description_zh: 你站在一個黑暗洞穴的入口。微弱的光線從外面透進來。

narrow-tunnel.name: Narrow Tunnel
narrow-tunnel.description: A cramped passage with rough stone walls. The air grows cooler as you venture deeper.
narrow-tunnel.description_zh: 一條狹窄的通道，牆壁由粗糙的石頭構成。隨著你深入探險，空氣變得更加涼爽。

treasure-room.name: Treasure Room
treasure-room.description: A glittering chamber filled with gold coins and precious artifacts. Wealth beyond measure surrounds you.
treasure-room.description_zh: 一間閃閃發光的房間，充滿了金幣和珍貴的文物。難以計量的財富環繞著你。

underground-lake.name: Underground Lake
underground-lake.description: A vast cavern opening before you, with a dark underground lake stretching into the shadows. Strange echoes bounce off the water.
underground-lake.description_zh: 一個巨大的洞窟在你面前展開，一片黑暗的地下湖延伸到陰影之中。奇異的回音從水面上彈跳。

secret-garden.name: Secret Garden
secret-garden.description: An impossible garden blooming underground, with flowers that glow softly in the darkness. You've found something magical.
secret-garden.description_zh: 一座不可思議的花園在地下綻放，花朵在黑暗中散發柔和的光芒。你發現了一些神奇的事物。

throne-room.name: Throne Room
throne-room.description: A vast chamber with a throne of obsidian and gold. The room feels heavy with ancient power. Your only choice is to retreat.
throne-room.description_zh: 一個巨大的房間，擺放著黑曜石與黃金打造的王座。房間瀰漫著古老力量的沉重感。你唯一的選擇是撤退。
